meta.title: Smart JSON Comparison Tool
meta.description: Professional JSON comparison tool that solves formatting, sorting, and difference marking issues

home.title: JSON Tools
home.subtitle: Professional JSON processing tool suite providing JSON comparison, formatting, validation, repair, conversion and more. Fast, secure, and free with large file support for efficient JSON data operations.
home.toolsSubtitle: Covering all aspects of JSON processing, from basic formatting to complex data conversion, meeting all developer needs
home.featuresSubtitle: Professional, efficient, and secure JSON processing tools to make your development work easier
home.ctaSubtitle: No registration, no download required. Use our JSON tools directly in your browser

compare.title: JSON Smart Compare Tool
compare.subtitle: Professional JSON difference detection tool supporting large files, complex nested structures, and intelligent array matching. Precisely identify field changes, additions, deletions with visual difference annotation.

format.title: JSON Format Tool
format.subtitle: Professional JSON beautification and compression tool with custom indentation and multiple sorting options. Make JSON code more beautiful and readable, improving development efficiency.

validate.title: JSON Validate Tool
validate.subtitle: Professional JSON syntax checker that intelligently detects JSON format errors with detailed error reports and fix suggestions. Quickly locate issues and improve code quality.
validate.validMessage: Your JSON format is completely correct with no syntax errors found.

repair.title: JSON Repair Tool
repair.subtitle: Intelligent JSON repair tool that automatically detects and fixes common JSON syntax errors. Supports AI-generated malformed JSON, missing quotes, extra commas and other intelligent repairs.

convert.title: JSON Convert Tool
convert.subtitle: Professional data format conversion tool supporting JSON to XML, CSV, YAML, SQL and other formats. Maintains data structure integrity for various data processing scenarios.

minify.title: JSON Minify Tool
minify.subtitle: Intelligent JSON compression tool that removes extra spaces, line breaks and comments to significantly reduce file size. Maintains JSON structure integrity for more efficient data transmission.

descriptions.none: Keep the original field order of JSON
descriptions.alphabetical: Sort by field names in alphabetical order
descriptions.type: Group by data types (null < boolean < number < string < array < object)

errors.invalidJsonFormat: Invalid JSON format, please check syntax

legend.title: Diff Legend
legend.added_desc: Field exists only in the right-side JSON
legend.removed_desc: Field exists only in the left-side JSON
legend.modified_desc: Field exists but has different value or type

placeholders.leftJson: Paste or enter your first JSON...
placeholders.rightJson: Paste or enter your second JSON...
placeholders.jsonInput: Please paste or enter JSON content...
placeholders.jsonToFormat: Paste or enter JSON to format...
placeholders.jsonToValidate: Paste or enter JSON to validate...
placeholders.jsonToConvert: Paste or enter JSON to convert...

messages.inputAndClick: Input JSON and click the corresponding button

footer.tip: Supports deep nested object and array comparison with intelligent field movement and type change detection
footer.compression: Intelligent compression algorithm maximizes file size reduction while maintaining JSON structure integrity
footer.validation: All validation performed locally to protect your data security. Supports large file validation.
footer.repair: Supports fixing: missing quotes, extra commas, JavaScript syntax, comments, undefined values and other common errors
footer.convert: Supports complex nested structure conversion, all processing done locally to protect your data security
footer.format: Supports large file formatting, all processing done locally to protect your data security

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: Uses latest algorithms, supports large file processing with response time <100ms

security.title: Secure & Reliable
security.description: Local processing, no server uploads, protecting your data privacy and security

i18n.title: Multi-language Support
i18n.description: Supports Chinese and English interfaces for global users

free.title: Completely Free
free.description: All features completely free, no registration required, use anytime anywhere
